Goals  ETH: to increase in moneyness  Ethereum: to make all the money verbs open & permissionless  - Transfer - Stabilize - Exchange - Lend - Fund - Pool - Stake - Save - Borrow - Bet - Long/Short  Ethereum has other aims yes. But these are its open finance goals

Money is an item that is accepted as payment within its own country or system. I cannot pay with Euro at a local coffee shop in the US.  ETH is accepted as payment (and even tax) in the Ethereum ecosystem. That's what matters.  Simply put, ETH is money.
